title: Dariga Shakimova
text: Dariga Shakimova (born 20 November 1988) is a Kazakhstani <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. In 2015, she was named the Female Boxer of the Year by the Kazakhstan Boxing Federation. She won a bronze medal in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%20middleweight">middleweight</a> event at the <a href="2016%20Summer%20Olympics">2016 Summer Olympics</a>. Shakimova studied at the Kazakh Academy of Sport and Tourism. After seeing the film "<a href="Million%20Dollar%20Baby">Million Dollar Baby</a>", her mother wanted to ban her from boxing, fearing for a serious injury. Shakimova's coach persuaded her to reconsider.
